cz.ive.genius
Interface Genius

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Updateable
All Known Subinterfaces:
AreaGenius
All Known Implementing Classes:
AreaGeniusImpl, BasicGenius, QueueGenius
public interface Genius
extends java.io.Serializable, Updateable

General genius interface. The genius tries to fulfill goals which are assigned to him. He (she..) can use sources which he "owns" to do this.

Author:
Honza

Method Summary
 void activate()
          Genius activates itself in this method, mainly registers on Hooks
 void addSource(Source source)
          The given source will be held by the genius to do more extended operations than with other objects.
 void addTopLevelGoal(Goal goal)
          Adddition of the Top-level goal to be fullfilled by this genius.
 void deactivate()
          Deactivates all the geniuses' goals
 java.lang.String getId()
          Getter for the genius' Id.
 java.util.List<Goal> getTopLevelGoals()
          Retrieves all top-level goals.
 void removeSource(Source source)
          The given source will no longer be genius's source.
 void removeTopLevelGoal(Goal goal)
          Removes a specified top level goal.
